name: Overdrive Warfare
storyline:
Overdrive Warfare is a dark, gritty FPS shooter developed by the indie developer known as Dynamite. Immerse yourself in the gripping narrative of a harrowing modern-day conflict unfolding in Eastern Europe. As global coalition forces unite against an insidious and unyielding enemy, your mission is to reclaim control of the once peaceful island known as 'Pulsar.'

As the story of Overdrive Warfare unfolds, collect intel to learn more about the factions in the Pulsar Island conflict including the relentless private military known as the 'Pulsar Group' who have been keen on reclaiming the former USSR territory since the early 1990s.
summary: Overdrive Warfare is a dark, gritty FPS shooter developed by the indie developer known as Dynamite. Immerse yourself in the gripping narrative of a harrowing modern-day conflict unfolding as global coalition forces unite against an insidious and unyielding enemy.
